entry.title: $2250 // Indoor/Outdoor living on Kane Street featuring woodburning fireplace!
entry.content:
Cuddle Up near your own wood burning fireplace In Prime Cobble Hill.
It's BBQ time get ready for spring to enjoy your outdoor space so green and serene! This one bedroom offers your own private entrance, wood floors throughout, bathroom with window, galley Eat in kitchen is open to the spacious living room overlooking Kane Street, cat ok, NO dogs, ALL utilities included....just pay RENT!
3 blocks to the f/ g train at Bergen Street Station, minutes to Bro Hall this is the best deal in town! Love living near all the neighborhood shops, restaurants & caf√©.
Around the corner from Union Market, Cobble Hill movie theatre & minutes to Trader Joes Brokers Fee more photos to come tenants moved out today
